title: Whoever invented USB-C deserves a Nobel Prize
content:
We tech reporters like to complain about tech a lot. Whether it’s the invasion of our privacy, worrisome use of AI, or the death of the headphone jack, we can be a fussy bunch. But as I emptied out boxes of old tech gear to start the new year fresh, I couldn’t help but be grateful for one of the best decisions the tech industry has made in the past few years: adopting USB-C. Back in 2015, when Apple first introduced USB-C to the mainstream with the redesigned MacBook, I called it the one port to rule them all. These…

description: Prepping to start 2022 afresh, I'm ever so grateful for one of the best decisions the tech industry has made recently: adopting USB-C.
